title: Respec
content:
nd Withers

Withers is the Npc in charge of Respecing, among a few other useful services. He can be found at the end of the Dank Crypt, an area which players can access early into the game.

Players can enter the Crypt in the area of the Ravaged Beach, called Chapel Entrance. There is a group of Bandits discussing outside, and players have to manage their way through to enter the Crypt, either by fighting or by convincing the adventurers that they should leave the area.
